value.value:
{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='20' y='38' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>動画字幕生成アプリ</text>
  
  <!-- ハンバーガーメニュー -->
  <rect x='740' y='15' width='30' height='30' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='5'/>
  <line x1='745' y1='25' x2='765' y2='25' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='745' y1='30' x2='765' y2='30' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='745' y1='35' x2='765' y2='35' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <!-- タブ -->
  <rect x='20' y='70' width='180' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='50' y='95' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕生成</text>
  <rect x='210' y='70' width='180' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#50E3C2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='250' y='95' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#50E3C2'>動画学習</text>
  
  <!-- 動画アップロードエリア -->
  <rect x='20' y='130' width='760' height='150' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='10' stroke-dasharray='5.5'/>
  <text x='280' y='190' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#4A90E2'>動画をドラッグ＆ドロップ</text>
  <text x='320' y='220' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>または</text>
  <rect x='340' y='230' width='120' height='40' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='360' y='255' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>ファイル選択</text>
  
  <!-- 字幕設定エリア -->
  <text x='20' y='320' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>字幕設定</text>
  <rect x='20' y='330' width='370' height='250' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2' rx='10'/>
  
  <text x='40' y='360' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>フォント</text>
  <rect x='40' y='370' width='330' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='50' y='395' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>Noto Sans JP</text>
  
  <text x='40' y='430' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>フォントサイズ</text>
  <rect x='40' y='440' width='330' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='50' y='465' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>16</text>
  
  <text x='40' y='500' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>フォント色</text>
  <rect x='40' y='510' width='160' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <rect x='50' y='520' width='20' height='20' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
  <text x='80' y='535' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>#FFFFFF</text>
  
  <text x='210' y='500' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>背景色</text>
  <rect x='210' y='510' width='160' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <rect x='220' y='520' width='20' height='20' fill='#000000'/>
  <text x='250' y='535' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>#000000</text>
  
  <!-- フィルター設定エリア -->
  <text x='410' y='320' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>フィルター設定</text>
  <rect x='410' y='330' width='370' height='250' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='2' rx='10'/>
  
  <rect x='430' y='350' width='330' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='440' y='375' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#999999'>フィルターワードを入力</text>
  
  <rect x='430' y='400' width='80' height='30' fill='#F5A623' rx='15'/>
  <text x='445' y='420' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>えーと</text>
  
  <rect x='520' y='400' width='80' height='30' fill='#F5A623' rx='15'/>
  <text x='535' y='420' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>あのー</text>
  
  <rect x='610' y='400' width='80' height='30' fill='#F5A623' rx='15'/>
  <text x='625' y='420' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>まぁ</text>
  
  <!-- 変換ボタン -->
  <rect x='300' y='540' width='200' height='50' fill='#50E3C2' rx='25'/>
  <text x='360' y='572' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#FFFFFF'>変換開始</text>
</svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='20' y='38' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>動画字幕生成アプリ</text>
  
  <!-- ナビゲーションメニュー -->
  <rect x='20' y='80' width='200' height='40' rx='20' fill='#50E3C2'/>
  <text x='70' y='108' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>字幕生成</text>
  <rect x='240' y='80' width='200' height='40' rx='20' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#50E3C2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='300' y='108' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>学習管理</text>
  
  <!-- メインコンテンツエリア -->
  <rect x='20' y='140' width='760' height='440' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <!-- 動画アップロードエリア -->
  <rect x='40' y='160' width='360' height='200' fill='#F0F0F0' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-dasharray='5,5' stroke-width='2'/>
  <text x='120' y='240' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#666666'>ここに動画をドラッグ＆ドロップ</text>
  <rect x='140' y='260' width='160' height='40' rx='20' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='180' y='286' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>ファイルを選択</text>
  
  <!-- 字幕設定エリア -->
  <text x='440' y='180' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>字幕設定</text>
  <rect x='440' y='200' width='320' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='450' y='226' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#666666'>フォント選択</text>
  <rect x='440' y='250' width='320' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='450' y='276' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#666666'>フォントサイズ</text>
  <rect x='440' y='300' width='320' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='450' y='326' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#666666'>文字色</text>
  
  <!-- フィルター設定エリア -->
  <text x='40' y='400' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>フィルター設定</text>
  <rect x='40' y='420' width='720' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='50' y='446' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#666666'>除外したいキーワードを入力</text>
  <rect x='40' y='470' width='720' height='80' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#CCCCCC' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='50' y='496' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#666666'>フィルター適用履歴</text>
  
  <!-- 実行ボタン -->
  <rect x='600' y='560' width='160' height='40' rx='20' fill='#F5A623'/>
  <text x='650' y='586' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕生成開始</text>
  
  <!-- ハンバーガーメニュー -->
  <rect x='760' y='15' width='30' height='4' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
  <rect x='760' y='25' width='30' height='4' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
  <rect x='760' y='35' width='30' height='4' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
</svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='20' y='40' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕生成アプリ</text>
  
  <!-- ハンバーガーメニュー -->
  <rect x='740' y='15' width='40' height='30' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='5'/>
  <line x1='745' y1='25' x2='775' y2='25' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='745' y1='35' x2='775' y2='35' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='745' y1='45' x2='775' y2='45' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <!-- タブ -->
  <rect x='20' y='80' width='200' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='70' y='105' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕生成</text>
  <rect x='230' y='80' width='200' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='280' y='105' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#4A90E2'>動画学習</text>
  
  <!-- 動画アップロードエリア -->
  <rect x='20' y='140' width='760' height='120' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5 5' rx='10'/>
  <text x='300' y='200' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#4A90E2'>動画をドラッグ＆ドロップ</text>
  <rect x='320' y='220' width='160' height='30' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='355' y='240' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>ファイルを選択</text>
  
  <!-- 字幕デザイン設定パネル -->
  <rect x='20' y='280' width='370' height='200' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='10'/>
  <text x='40' y='310' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>字幕デザイン設定</text>
  <text x='40' y='340' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>フォント:</text>
  <rect x='100' y='325' width='150' height='25' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
  <text x='110' y='343' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>Noto Sans JP</text>
  <text x='40' y='375' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>サイズ:</text>
  <rect x='100' y='360' width='60' height='25' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
  <text x='110' y='378' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>16</text>
  <text x='40' y='410' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>色:</text>
  <rect x='100' y='395' width='60' height='25' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
  <rect x='105' y='400' width='15' height='15' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
  <text x='125' y='413' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>#FFFFFF</text>
  <text x='40' y='445' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>背景:</text>
  <rect x='100' y='430' width='60' height='25' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
  <rect x='105' y='435' width='15' height='15' fill='#000000'/>
  <text x='125' y='448' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>#000000</text>
  
  <!-- フィルター設定パネル -->
  <rect x='410' y='280' width='370' height='200' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='10'/>
  <text x='430' y='310' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>フィルター設定</text>
  <rect x='430' y='325' width='330' height='60' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='1' rx='5'/>
  <text x='440' y='345' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#333333'>除外したい単語や文章を入力</text>
  <rect x='430' y='400' width='150' height='30' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='470' y='420' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>フィルター追加</text>
  <rect x='590' y='400' width='170' height='30' fill='#F5A623' rx='5'/>
  <text x='620' y='420' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='14' fill='#FFFFFF'>フィルター一覧表示</text>
  
  <!-- 変換実行ボタン -->
  <rect x='300' y='500' width='200' height='50' fill='#50E3C2' rx='25'/>
  <text x='360' y='530' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#FFFFFF'>変換実行</text>
  
  <!-- プログレスバー -->
  <rect x='20' y='570' width='760' height='10' fill='#E0E0E0' rx='5'/>
  <rect x='20' y='570' width='380' height='10' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
</svg>"
}

{"svg":"<svg width=\"800\" height=\"600\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\">
  <rect width=\"800\" height=\"600\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\"/>
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect width=\"800\" height=\"60\" fill=\"#4A90E2\"/>
  <text x=\"20\" y=\"40\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"24\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">動画学習画面</text>
  
  <!-- ハンバーガーメニュー -->
  <rect x=\"740\" y=\"15\" width=\"40\" height=\"30\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <line x1=\"745\" y1=\"25\" x2=\"775\" y2=\"25\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  <line x1=\"745\" y1=\"35\" x2=\"775\" y2=\"35\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  <line x1=\"745\" y1=\"45\" x2=\"775\" y2=\"45\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  
  <!-- 動画アップロードエリア -->
  <rect x=\"50\" y=\"100\" width=\"700\" height=\"150\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\" rx=\"10\"/>
  <text x=\"375\" y=\"175\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#333333\" text-anchor=\"middle\">ここをクリックまたはドラッグ＆ドロップして動画をアップロード</text>
  <path d=\"M375 130 L375 160 M360 145 L375 130 L390 145\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\" fill=\"none\"/>
  
  <!-- 学習実行ボタン -->
  <rect x=\"300\" y=\"280\" width=\"200\" height=\"50\" fill=\"#50E3C2\" rx=\"25\"/>
  <text x=\"400\" y=\"312\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" text-anchor=\"middle\">学習を実行</text>
  
  <!-- プログレスバー -->
  <rect x=\"50\" y=\"360\" width=\"700\" height=\"30\" fill=\"#E0E0E0\" rx=\"15\"/>
  <rect x=\"50\" y=\"360\" width=\"350\" height=\"30\" fill=\"#4A90E2\" rx=\"15\"/>
  <text x=\"400\" y=\"382\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\" text-anchor=\"middle\">学習進捗: 50%</text>
  
  <!-- 学習履歴リスト -->
  <rect x=\"50\" y=\"420\" width=\"700\" height=\"150\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#E0E0E0\" stroke-width=\"1\"/>
  <text x=\"70\" y=\"450\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">学習履歴</text>
  <line x1=\"50\" y1=\"470\" x2=\"750\" y2=\"470\" stroke=\"#E0E0E0\" stroke-width=\"1\"/>
  <text x=\"70\" y=\"500\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"14\" fill=\"#333333\">2023/06/01 - video001.mp4 (完了)</text>
  <text x=\"70\" y=\"530\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"14\" fill=\"#333333\">2023/05/28 - video002.mp4 (完了)</text>
  <text x=\"70\" y=\"560\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"14\" fill=\"#333333\">2023/05/25 - video003.mp4 (完了)</text>
</svg>"}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
    <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
    
    <!-- ヘッダー -->
    <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
    <text x='20' y='38' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>フィルター設定</text>
    
    <!-- メインコンテンツエリア -->
    <rect x='40' y='80' width='720' height='500' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='10'/>
    
    <!-- 既存フィルター一覧 -->
    <text x='60' y='120' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>既存フィルター</text>
    <rect x='60' y='140' width='680' height='200' fill='#F0F0F0' rx='5'/>
    
    <rect x='70' y='150' width='660' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='5'/>
    <text x='80' y='175' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>えーと</text>
    <rect x='680' y='155' width='30' height='30' fill='#F5A623' rx='5'/>
    <text x='688' y='176' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>✕</text>
    
    <rect x='70' y='200' width='660' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='5'/>
    <text x='80' y='225' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>あのー</text>
    <rect x='680' y='205' width='30' height='30' fill='#F5A623' rx='5'/>
    <text x='688' y='226' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>✕</text>
    
    <!-- 新規フィルター追加 -->
    <text x='60' y='380' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>新規フィルター追加</text>
    <rect x='60' y='400' width='560' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='70' y='425' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#999999'>フィルターとして追加したい文字列を入力</text>
    
    <rect x='640' y='400' width='100' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='670' y='425' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>追加</text>
    
    <!-- 保存ボタン -->
    <rect x='600' y='520' width='140' height='40' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
    <text x='645' y='545' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>保存</text>
    
    <!-- ハンバーガーメニュー -->
    <rect x='740' y='10' width='40' height='40' fill='#3A80D2' rx='5'/>
    <line x1='750' y1='20' x2='770' y2='20' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='750' y1='30' x2='770' y2='30' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
    <line x1='750' y1='40' x2='770' y2='40' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
  </svg>"
}

value.screenName: 字幕デザイン設定画面
value.value:
{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <rect x='20' y='20' width='760' height='60' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='40' y='60' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕デザイン設定</text>
  
  <rect x='40' y='100' width='720' height='460' fill='#FFFFFF' rx='10' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <text x='60' y='140' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>フォント選択</text>
  <rect x='60' y='160' width='320' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='80' y='185' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>Noto Sans JP</text>
  <path d='M360 180 l10 -10 l10 10' fill='none' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <text x='420' y='140' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>フォントサイズ</text>
  <rect x='420' y='160' width='120' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <text x='440' y='185' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>16</text>
  <text x='550' y='185' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>px</text>
  
  <text x='60' y='240' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>フォント色</text>
  <rect x='60' y='260' width='40' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <circle cx='80' cy='280' r='15' fill='#333333'/>
  
  <text x='120' y='240' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>背景色</text>
  <rect x='120' y='260' width='40' height='40' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#4A90E2' stroke-width='2' rx='5'/>
  <rect x='125' y='265' width='30' height='30' fill='#000000' rx='3'/>
  
  <text x='60' y='340' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='18' fill='#333333'>プレビュー</text>
  <rect x='60' y='360' width='680' height='120' fill='#000000' rx='5'/>
  <text x='80' y='420' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>サンプルテキスト これは字幕のプレビューです</text>
  
  <rect x='320' y='500' width='160' height='40' fill='#50E3C2' rx='20'/>
  <text x='380' y='525' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>保存</text>
  
  <rect x='740' y='20' width='40' height='40' fill='#4A90E2' rx='5'/>
  <line x1='750' y1='30' x2='770' y2='30' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='750' y1='40' x2='770' y2='40' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
  <line x1='750' y1='50' x2='770' y2='50' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
</svg>"
}

{
  "svg": "<svg width='800' height='600' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <rect width='800' height='600' fill='#F8F8F8'/>
  
  <rect x='0' y='0' width='800' height='60' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='20' y='40' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='24' fill='#FFFFFF'>動画字幕生成アプリ</text>
  
  <rect x='720' y='10' width='40' height='40' rx='20' fill='#FFFFFF'/>
  <circle cx='740' cy='30' r='15' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <path d='M732 30 L748 30 M740 22 L740 38' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <rect x='20' y='80' width='760' height='500' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  
  <text x='40' y='120' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>動画ファイルをアップロード</text>
  <rect x='40' y='140' width='720' height='100' rx='5' fill='#F0F0F0' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='280' y='200' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#999999'>ここにファイルをドラッグ＆ドロップするか</text>
  <rect x='330' y='180' width='120' height='40' rx='20' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='355' y='205' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>選択する</text>
  
  <text x='40' y='280' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>字幕スタイル</text>
  <rect x='40' y='300' width='200' height='40' rx='5' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='55' y='325' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>フォント選択</text>
  <path d='M220 320 L230 310 L240 320' fill='none' stroke='#333333' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <rect x='260' y='300' width='200' height='40' rx='5' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='275' y='325' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>フォントサイズ</text>
  <path d='M440 320 L450 310 L460 320' fill='none' stroke='#333333' stroke-width='2'/>
  
  <rect x='480' y='300' width='100' height='40' rx='5' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  <rect x='490' y='310' width='20' height='20' fill='#FF0000'/>
  <text x='520' y='325' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#333333'>色選択</text>
  
  <text x='40' y='380' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='20' fill='#333333'>フィルター設定</text>
  <rect x='40' y='400' width='720' height='40' rx='5' fill='#FFFFFF' stroke='#E0E0E0' stroke-width='1'/>
  <text x='55' y='425' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#999999'>除外したい単語やフレーズを入力（カンマ区切り）</text>
  
  <rect x='40' y='460' width='200' height='40' rx='20' fill='#50E3C2'/>
  <text x='90' y='485' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕を生成</text>
  
  <rect x='260' y='460' width='200' height='40' rx='20' fill='#F5A623'/>
  <text x='310' y='485' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>プレビュー</text>
  
  <rect x='480' y='460' width='280' height='40' rx='20' fill='#4A90E2'/>
  <text x='555' y='485' font-family='Noto Sans JP' font-size='16' fill='#FFFFFF'>字幕ファイルをダウンロード</text>
</svg>"
}

value.screenName: ハンバーガーメニュー
value.value:
{"svg":"<svg width=\"800\" height=\"600\" xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\">
  <rect width=\"800\" height=\"600\" fill=\"#F8F8F8\"/>
  
  <!-- ヘッダー -->
  <rect width=\"800\" height=\"60\" fill=\"#4A90E2\"/>
  <text x=\"20\" y=\"40\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"24\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">字幕生成アプリ</text>
  
  <!-- ハンバーガーメニュー -->
  <rect x=\"740\" y=\"15\" width=\"40\" height=\"30\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <line x1=\"745\" y1=\"25\" x2=\"775\" y2=\"25\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  <line x1=\"745\" y1=\"35\" x2=\"775\" y2=\"35\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  <line x1=\"745\" y1=\"45\" x2=\"775\" y2=\"45\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\"/>
  
  <!-- タブ -->
  <rect x=\"20\" y=\"70\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#50E3C2\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"45\" y=\"95\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">字幕生成</text>
  <rect x=\"150\" y=\"70\" width=\"120\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#E0E0E0\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"185\" y=\"95\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">学習</text>
  
  <!-- 動画アップロードエリア -->
  <rect x=\"20\" y=\"130\" width=\"760\" height=\"200\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"2\" rx=\"10\"/>
  <text x=\"300\" y=\"220\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#4A90E2\">動画をドラッグ＆ドロップ</text>
  <text x=\"340\" y=\"250\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">または</text>
  <rect x=\"320\" y=\"270\" width=\"160\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#F5A623\" rx=\"20\"/>
  <text x=\"355\" y=\"295\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">ファイルを選択</text>
  
  <!-- フィルター設定 -->
  <text x=\"20\" y=\"370\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"20\" fill=\"#333333\">フィルター設定</text>
  <rect x=\"20\" y=\"390\" width=\"300\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"1\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"30\" y=\"415\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#999999\">フィルターワードを入力</text>
  <rect x=\"330\" y=\"390\" width=\"100\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#4A90E2\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"355\" y=\"415\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">追加</text>
  
  <!-- フォント設定 -->
  <text x=\"20\" y=\"470\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"20\" fill=\"#333333\">フォント設定</text>
  <rect x=\"20\" y=\"490\" width=\"200\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"1\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"30\" y=\"515\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">Noto Sans JP</text>
  <rect x=\"230\" y=\"490\" width=\"90\" height=\"40\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\" stroke=\"#4A90E2\" stroke-width=\"1\" rx=\"5\"/>
  <text x=\"250\" y=\"515\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"16\" fill=\"#333333\">16px</text>
  
  <!-- 字幕生成ボタン -->
  <rect x=\"600\" y=\"520\" width=\"180\" height=\"50\" fill=\"#F5A623\" rx=\"25\"/>
  <text x=\"645\" y=\"550\" font-family=\"Noto Sans JP\" font-size=\"18\" fill=\"#FFFFFF\">字幕を生成</text>
</svg>"}
